algorithm.description: The Random Number Generator algorithm identifier for the SecureRandom factory method used to create the SecureRandom represented by this object's configuration. See Appendix A in the Java Cryptography Architecture API Specification and Reference guide for information about standard RNG algorithm names.

provider.description: The optional provider identifier for the SecureRandom factory method used to create the SecureRandom represented by this object's configuration.

camelContextId.description: Id of CamelContext to use if there are multiple CamelContexts in the same JVM
